reviewText:
Quite a Original puzzle game .
for the asking price of this gem its a must have for the library .

Pro's
Fun thought provoking levels , challenging but achievable ,
good help system to get you started in the game .
hints are built in the game background itself if you watch .
secret areas and multi paths available some levels .
Luckily not permadeath :P frequent save points .

Con's
no pointer for where your aiming building blocks (not a major issue though)

reviewText: Great game for only $3! Runs extremly smooth, even when a room full of liquidy goo cascading towards your face. :) Fun music and some good challenge curve throughout the game. Once you get the hang of building, you can go basically anywhere. For $3, it's a 10/10. Would melt again.

reviewText: Remember to use a controller!  The game plays much better with it IMHO!\n\nSuper fun game!
